Key Match Events: Shohei Ohtani hit a go-ahead single in a five-run seventh inning
Will Smith had a game-tying two-run homer and Mookie Betts added a two-run single in the seventh
Max Muncy worked a leadoff walk and Smith hit a game-tying home run
Enrique Hernandez had a pinch-hit single and Andy Pages was awarded first base on catcher's interference before Ohtani hit a slow roller into right field for a 3-2 lead
Betts followed with his two-run double
Pages hit a two-run home run for the Dodgers in the eighth
Post-Match Reflections: Freddie Freeman departed in the seventh inning after rolling his right ankle trying to beat out a ground ball to second base
The slugger's absence would be a big blow for the powerful Dodgers lineup
